title: Bloomberg Law: Stein and Painter on Fiduciary Rule (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law: Stein and Painter on Fiduciary Rule (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Elliott Stein, Senior Analyst:Litigation for Bloomberg Intelligence, and Richard W Painter, a Professor of Corporate Law at the University of Minnesota, discuss lawsuits challenging fiduciary rule. They speak with June Grasso on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
